item.description:
Looks as if the weather might be less than perfect for hiking but if it's not too bad Buffett and I might still go out for a hike with length options to suit your needs.

The basic hike should be about 2 hours over wooded trails, fields, and forest roads.  There will be an option to add distance at the end if any one chooses while others can easily keep within the 2-hour frame.

NOTE THE CHANGE IN MEETING PLACE.

Hope to see you there.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Let's get the dogs out for an April First Sunday Hike
